results.content:
The course started well but I was unable to continue as there was an issue with the version of rails I was using. I added a comment but have not had any feedback from the instructor.
I could change the rails version or look online for the solution, for me this is not the issue, the issue I have with this course is that it is not updated or being maintained so there is no feedback or support from the instructor, in anyform. I would not recommend it to anyone new to the topic.
